io.werval.spi.server

Interface HttpServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpServerAdapter 

    public interface HttpServer
    Werval Http Server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Activate the Werval Http Server.
      void passivate()
      Passivate the Werval Http Server.
      void registerPassivationShutdownHook()
      Register a JVM shutdown hook to passivate the HttpServer.
      void setApplicationSPI(ApplicationSPI application)
      Set the Application SPI.
      void setDevShellSPI(DevShellSPI devSpi)
      Set the Development Shell SPI.

    • Method Detail

      • setApplicationSPI

        void setApplicationSPI(ApplicationSPI application)
        Set the Application SPI.
        Parameters:
        application - ApplicationSPI

      • setDevShellSPI

        void setDevShellSPI(DevShellSPI devSpi)
        Set the Development Shell SPI.
        Parameters:
        devSpi - DevShell SPI

      • activate

        void activate()
        Activate the Werval Http Server.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if ApplicationSPI is not set
        WervalException - if unable to activate HttpServer

      • passivate

        void passivate()
        Passivate the Werval Http Server.
        Throws:
        WervalException - if unable to passivate HttpServer

      • registerPassivationShutdownHook

        void registerPassivationShutdownHook()
        Register a JVM shutdown hook to passivate the HttpServer.

        This method can be called ony once.

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - when the passivation shutdown hook has already been registered
